name: Slime Dungeon (itch) (Bertie)
description:
DESCRIPTION:
Simple Dungeon Crawler.
The cold can kill, collect embers and lit fire pits to progress through the dungeon.
Find the shop and buy cards to upgrade your stats and gain new abilities.

CONTROLS:
WASD & Arrow Keys = Movement.
Mouse = Aim & Shoot.
(Unlockable) Space = Dash/Bash/Fire-Dash.
ESC = pause.
E = Interact.
